Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie centers around Miyazawa’s life beginning at age 9 and carries forward to his death during World War II at age 38. It shows how his family struggles in the harsh environment of a dairy farm, as well as suffering from weakness caused by genetic illness.
